name: Bromo Sunrise Tour
description:
As the highlight during your stay in Java, there's Bromo mountain which is also turn out to be the highlight visit around East Java.

A scenic view of volcanic chain between mount Bromo and Semeru mountain as the highest peak of Java island, this will stunned your eyes on its best sunrise scene.
Continue to explore the smoking Bromo crater which is the symbol of Tengger tribal, and have fun and scenic experience on the blacksand desert and Teletubbies hills
